#summary Organization Modification

*Case Number:* UC003

*Case Name:* Edit Organization

*Description:* An ISERN member wants to edit the information for their organization.

*Actors:*
  * Researcher – An ISERN member
  * System – The MyISERN application

*Frequency:* Low

*Preconditions:*
  * The researcher is viewing their own organization's information.

*Postconditions:*
  * The organization information is modified.

*Basic Course:*
|| *User* || *System* ||
|| 1. The researcher is viewing an organization's information and clicks on the edit organization button. || 2. The system loads the edit organization form. ||
|| 3. The researcher changes the location, country, web page, what the organization does, and/or the organization status. ||  ||
|| 4. The researcher clicks on the save button. || 5. The system saves the new information. ||
||  || 6. The system tells the user that the action was successful and loads the homepage. ||
